name: Extreme Challenging Car Stunts
description:
Perform high jumps on massive stunt tracks, smash all type of obstacles to win the challenge with your stunt car. Race against a train, chase the other racing cars through the stunt city road.
Extreme Challenging Car Stunts game will give you chance to improve your racing skills. Driving a car on roads is an easy job but driving sports car in high speed with performing huge jumps and stunts is not an easy task. With this amazing city car stunt game, you are getting chance to polish your driving skills, so enjoy unique car racing challenge and extreme stunts adventure now.

Features:
1. Loads of impossible challenging missions to complete.
2. Addictive gameplay with lots of fun.
3. HD graphics and awesome sound effects.
4. Amazing cars and monster trucks to upgrade.
5. Awesome crazy race
